attributes.action: Instigate an investigation into the extortionate fees charged by High Street Banks, in connection with executing a will
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Banks have been caught with their hand in the till once again. The latest money generating scheme to come to light is the extortionate amounts charged for the execution of wills.

One Bank charged £18,000 to execute a will that contained six simple bequests to individuals, with the balance of the estate going to charity.

A solicitor would charge between £750 and £6,750 for the execution of a similar estate valued at £450,000, which is bad enough when you consider the comparative simplicity of the  will in question.

But at least the average solicitor is not as greedy as the average High Street Bank.

Any other individual who was caught taking such excessive advantage of the grieving and the deceased would be labelled as a crook and a cheat. He or she would have to face the full might of the Law.

So please add your name to this petition, and show your support for a practice that should at least be investigated by the Financial Ombudsman Service.

Thank You.
